glossentry.glossdef: The 5G architecture is defined as service-based and the interaction between network functions is represented using service-based interfaces for their interactions. The Service-based architecture uses network functions (for example: Session Management Function (SMF)) within the control plane to enable other authorized network functions to access their services.
Authentication, Authorization, and Accounting is a server program that handles user requests for access to computer resources and for an enterprise.
AA-Request provides session information to the PCRF for a new session.
Auto charge is a functionality to automatically recharge or renew a device or group when the user's subscription is about to expire or the subscription is about to get exhausted.
The status of a card when it is used by a subscriber.

Application Detection and Control is a set of rules that specify Quality of Service (QoS) limits and application redirection information for services. It is also used for detecting and reporting subscriber’s traffic flow
An administrator creates or delete users, resets the password for other users, and contains full permissions over the entire system.

Aerospike is an enterprise-grade, internet scale database for real-time, mission critical applications and analysis. Enterprise features include Cross Datacenter Replication™ (XDR), Fast Restart, Rapid Rebalance, and Security.
When an Aerospike database node is removed from a cluster, its data migrates between the remaining Aerospike database nodes (and vice versa when a node recovers and is added to the cluster).
Application Function
An agent sells recharge cards on behalf of the level 0 distributor, for instance, a retail outlet which is not associated with the distributor.

A warning or error message generated by the Alarm service in response to some events in OSP. If a service user is subscribed for an alarm in the alarm service, then the alarm is displayed to the subscriber in real-time.
Alert for monthly Limit being reached.
The Access Network Information AVP which indicates the SIP P-header value.
Call notification played to the subscriber either through SMS or USSD.
Application Programming Interface is an interface that allows two software programs to communicate with each other.
Access Point Name represents either a complete APN or a subset of the APN (leading characters).
Automatic Recharge Threshold is the minimum amount of balance that is defined after which an automatic recharge is triggered.
Agile Rules Technology are a set of techniques that accelerate and enhance product development process.
Add Subscription Action generates a Success Event or a Failure Event to the lifecycle of the account or the subscription that initiated this action.
American Standard Code for Information Interchange is a common format for text files in the computer system and the Internet.
Abstract Syntax Notation is a standard interface description language to describe the data structure of a message that is sent or received in a network.
Aggregate View provides a consolidated view of various measurements of bucket and counters.

Attribute Value Pair is a method of data representation in computing systems and applications. It is an open-ended data structure that enables future extension without modifying existing code or data. Except in such situations, all or part of the data model is expressed as a collection of AVPs.
